summary: Farkas wears Wolf armor, even after Dustman\'s Cairn.
descriptionHtml:
I\'ve seen a couple of mods that do this and have even tried my hand at it a few times myself. It\'s commonly reported that Farkas switches back to Steel armor after the Silver Hand encounter a Dustman\'s Cairn. 

I found the script that manages that encounter and tried modding that, but he keeps changing to Steel anyway and I cannot figure out why. So, as most people are want to do in desperate times, I resorted to ugly hacks to get it done.

There are 18 references to the ArmorSteelNoHelmet outfit in the game. 16 of them have been changed to a newly created ArmorSteelNoHelmetCopy0000 and the original has been modified to contain Wolf armor pieces. 

This has been tested up to Dustman\'s Cairn and is confirmed working.
author: HyphenC
